attributes.comment:
I understand the need to raise fees on services, however, the amount of the fee
increases for adoption-related services is irrational and unacceptable. Adoption is
already very expense and these increases decrease the number of children finding
homes even further. A reasonable increase of 5-10% would be acceptable, but this is
simply a way to extort more money from families desperate for children.

23% increase
I-600/600A
Petition to Classify Orphan as an Immediate Relative
$ 545
$ 670

73% increase
N-565
Application for Replacement of Certificate of Citizenship (used for
name changes)
$ 220
$ 380

80% increase
N-600
Application for Certificate of Citizenship
$ 255
$ 460

14% increase
Biometric Services (fingerprints)
$ 70
$ 80

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Hannah Dethrow
